EmailTemplate.subject: Step Forward: are you the perfect candidate for the job?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Step_Forward_Activity__c.StepFwd_Associate_first_name_confirm__c},
As you know Step Forward work hard to match you with the right employer and we thought that you might be interested to hear about some upcoming roles in the Business Administration pathway. We've attached some job descriptions for upcoming jobs. If you feel that you are the right person for any of the roles currently available then you can put yourself forward and we’ll consider you for upcoming interviews.
Make sure to read the job description of each role carefully and check the time and cost of your commute to the employer's office. If you feel that you fit the person specification and have a real interest in a specific role then you can put yourself forward for consideration by completing the form below by midnight on Sunday 19th June. We’ll then get in touch if you are shortlisted for an interview.
N.B. If you don't think that you are suited to one of these roles we will continue to match you as normal.
Apply For a Role
The British Home
Interviewing 29th June
Do you have an interest in social care or a career in the medical sector? The British Home are an independent charity looking for a proactive and empathetic candidate to provide vital HR and admin activities while interacting with residents.
CSL Dual
Interviewing 28th June
The UKs leading supplier of communication equipment within the security market are looking for someone to go the extra mile to deliver excellent customer service. You’ll join a fast-paced team that pushes boundaries to ensure that decision makers get the competitive edge they need to succeed.
The British Exploring Society
Interviewing early July (date tbc)
The British Exploring Society is an organisation dedicated to giving young people the chance to discover their own capabilities on adventurous and scientific expeditions all over the world. They’re looking for candidates to fill a number of roles throughout their organisation to ensure that they can continue to deliver programmes that change lives.
